      • graphPlotType

        public void graphPlotType(java.lang.String plotType,
                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> titles,
                 org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray[] matrices,
                 java.lang.String saveFilePath)
        graphPlotType sets up data to pass to scripts that render graphs
        Parameters:
        plotType - sets which plot to call whether "multi" for multiple matrices histograms, "hist" for a histogram of one matrix, or "scatter" for scatter plot
        titles - the titles of the plots
        matrices - the matrices to plot

      • plotWeightHistograms

        public void plotWeightHistograms(Layer network,
                        Gradient gradient)
        plotWeightHistograms graphs values of vBias, W, and hBias on aggregate and most recent mini-batch updates (-gradient)
        Parameters:
        network - the trained neural net model
        gradient - latest updates to weights and biases

      • plotWeightHistograms

        public void plotWeightHistograms(Layer network)

      • plotActivations

        public void plotActivations(Layer network)
        plotActivations show how hidden neurons are used, how often on vs. off and correlation
        Parameters:
        network - the trained neural net model

        Parameters:
